item.title: Chord Formula Cheat Sheet - Music Theory Design Sticker by guitarstreams
item.description: This music theory cheat sheet shows the formulas for these 9 chord types: Major, Major 7th, Minor, Minor 7th, Dominant 7th, Diminished, Augmented, Suspended 2nd and Suspended 4th and example chords. Knowing how chords work and more importantly how to use t

item.title: 7 Modern Musical Modes Cheat Sheet
item.description: This cheat sheet shows the 7 modern musical modes Ionian, Dorian, Phrygian, Lydian, Mixolydian, Aeolian, Locrian, and for each of them the tonic relative to the major scale, the step sequence and an example whole note scale. The scales make clear how these modes work and show that music theory does… • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.
